user_input: Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. Use Hydrogen as the complement not the carrier. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Terajoule Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input for TYNDP 2026 Hybrid Heat Pump demand processing and export, without accessing a PLEXOS database.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly demand profiles for the Hybrid Heat Pump carrier for TYNDP 2026 scenarios: NT, NT_HE, NT_LE. Years: 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050. Enable node splitting. Use Hydrogen as the complement (not the carrier). Do not access any PLEXOS database. Output should be suitable for subsequent export to TST format.

tasks.description: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios ['NT', 'NT_HE', 'NT_LE'] and years [2030, 2035, 2040, 2050], with node splitting enabled and Hydrogen set as the complement (not the carrier).
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', determine the scenarios, years, node splitting, and Hydrogen complement settings to generate the required hourly demand profiles.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly demand profiles to TST format for the 'Hybrid Heat Pump' carrier.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', export outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' to the standard TST format for TYNDP 2026.
